title: Get back to work.. I mean a real one. Finish what you started
body:
If the rework team was warking as good as they write excuses,there wouldn't be half assed reworks.
I'm not getting angry because you don't succeed. I'm angry because you're giving up.
As Statikk said
"Hopefully we largely addressed this with the previous Morde threads, but I'll reiterate again. I think we can all agree that the Morde rework wasn't our best work from several different angles. We probably didn't get enough benefit out of the cost of changes we incurred here. Still stand by our position, that he is ultimately healthier and will continue to be tweaked towards the duo lane at least for the short term. I agree that long term, we probably need to revisit Morde and do a full overhaul, but that's probably far in the future unfortunately."

"we probably need to revisit Morde and do a full overhaul, but that's probably far in the future unfortunately."
sad...I was waiting for something since end 2013.now i won't wait for anything.
You've lost my trust so don't screw up on Yorick rework ,you'll end up loosing credibility. 
(no need for comments on this post,just posting it because i'm angry about that)

replies.body: I do agree with you; Mordekaiser is a train wreck of nonsense. Of course, I've been waiting for a Taric rework for a long time, and he's almost here. This is the one that will determine if I continue playing league or not.

> [{quoted}](name=Psychodrive,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=XibGmuLg,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-12-20T20:04:58.235+0000)
>
> I do agree with you; Mordekaiser is a train wreck of nonsense. Of course, I've been waiting for a Taric rework for a long time, and he's almost here. This is the one that will determine if I continue playing league or not.

still don't understand why we get downvoted. i'm sure if it was their main,they would react the same way

Because all you're doing is complaining. You've offered nothing in the way of suggestions. Morde is STILL being played with, and most of his tweaking was done in August of this [year](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/V5.16), so it's not like they're doing nothing. So that is why you're getting downvoted.

When Quinn got reworked, my response:

"You've taken out the spirit of tag-team", not, "this is a trainwreck of nonsense"

When Fiora got reworked, my response:

"I don't like the hitboxes on vital points", not, "this is a trainwreck of nonsense, and I'm going to post my rage in Concepts and Creations for some reason."

They're my mains, but they're RIOT'S champions! It doesn't matter if I don't like it. It's their call.
